name: workspace
description: ```js // render the main character var Renderer = require('renderer') var canvas = document.createElement('canvas') // finite state machine for events dispatched by blocks var Store = require('vm') // blocks, with a panel var { BlockPanel, Step, Turn, Jump } = require('blocks') // set the blocks for this instance of the panel var panel = BlockPanel({   'step': Step,   'turn': Turn,   'jump': Jump }) // create the virtual machine for this specific set of blocks var vm = Store(panel)
